name: Annual Mental Health & Tech Innovation Summit
description: A full-day summit exploring how technology can enhance mental well-being in the workplace. Discussions will focus on innovative strategies to reduce employee stress and promote mental health within the tech industry.

agenda.topic: Tech Solutions for Reducing Workplace Stress
agenda.speaker: Sarah Lee

agenda.topic: Using AI to Foster Mental Wellness at Work
agenda.speaker: Tom Parker

name: Mental Health Wellness Retreat
description: A serene retreat dedicated to rejuvenating mental health. Participants will engage in yoga, mindfulness, and nature activities aimed at reducing workplace anxiety and burnout, fostering overall well-being.

name: Mental Health & Cybersecurity Awareness Day
description: A workshop addressing the mental health impacts of cybersecurity threats and strategies to alleviate stress related to telecom vulnerabilities.

name: Mental Resilience Hackathon 2024
description: A 12-hour hackathon where teams work on tech solutions that promote mental resilience and well-being. The event emphasizes collaboration and healthy competition.

name: Leadership Development for Mental Well-Being
description: A workshop aimed at building leadership skills with a focus on mental well-being. Sessions will cover stress management and fostering a supportive work environment.

name: Diversity, Inclusion & Mental Health Panel
description: A panel discussion on how diversity and inclusion foster a supportive mental health environment. Panelists will explore strategies for promoting mental wellness in diverse teams.

agenda.topic: Creating Inclusive Workplaces for Mental Wellness
agenda.speaker: Maria Lopez

name: Holiday Charity Gala for Mental Health
description: A charity gala where Bell employees gather to raise funds for mental health initiatives. The evening includes live entertainment and aims to support community mental wellness during the holiday season.

name: AI for Mental Wellness Workshop
description: An interactive workshop on how AI can support mental wellness in the workplace by reducing pressure and enhancing employee support systems.

sessions.topic: Automating Support Systems for Better Mental Health

name: Employee Appreciation Day: Focus on Mental Health
description: An afternoon dedicated to appreciating Bell employees while emphasizing mental health support resources and fostering a positive work culture.

name: Managing Mental Health While Working Remotely Webinar
